Projects.Timedle_description: Timedle is a creative history game that turns learning into a daily adventure. Each day, a new historical question is posted to challenge students' knowledge and help them earn points in a fun and interactive way.
Projects.GeographyGame_description: A Game of Geography takes students on a journey to explore the world through daily geography questions. Each new question helps players learn more about geography while competing to score points.
Projects.RandomCity_description: Random City Generator creates cities by generating random names, populations, and countries. It is the perfect tool for world builders and geography enthusiasts.
Projects.RandomCity_subtitle: Top results on Google for 'random city generator'
Projects.PersonalWebsite_description: This is my personal website, showcasing my projects, skills, and professional development. Built with Next.js and Chakra UI, this site supports multiple languages, demonstrating my passion for global collaboration.

Contact Me.Title 1: Whether it's a job opportunity, a coffee chat,
Contact Me.Title 2: or just a friendly conversation, feel free to reach out!
